reviews.name: Andreea
reviews.message: Great place for a romantic getaway. Looking forward to return here. The place is unique and quaint.

reviews.name: Andrei
reviews.message: Highly recommend! Very nice and very clean! We benefited from excellent conditions, tranquility and gorgeous view, very kind hosts and 2 wonderful furry as relaxation partners. We stayed for 2 nights and would have stayed at least more! We will definitely be back!

reviews.name: Octavian
reviews.message: Piece of Heaven is an amazing place with beautiful surroundings. Dragos and his family were amazing hosts, very responsive and helpful. The place is very quiet, but is also close to restaurants and other activities. The animals are extremely friendly and we fell in love with the two Bernese dogs. It was a great experience which we are eager to repeat soon.

reviews.name: Roland
reviews.message: Lovely location, the place was very peaceful and cozy. My only problem was the bed, i really didn't manage to get a good night's sleep, but that doesn't mean there was anything wrong with the bed, it just wasn't meant for me apparently.

reviews.name: Elien
reviews.message: We really enjoyed the experience. We didn't find the right location right away, but the host drove to meet us to help us. We felt right at home also fantastic pets! No negative points at all!

reviews.name: Tudor
reviews.message: Felt very peaceful and the animals were friendly.

reviews.name: Cristian
reviews.message: Awesome place, perfect to relax and get some fresh air.

reviews.name: George

reviews.name: Ludmilla
reviews.message: one night We were super happy of our stay, the house is very cozy and surrounded by nature and animals, everything was perfect and very clean! We spent a very nice stay, thank you!

reviews.name: Alex
reviews.message: Amazing place for a getaway in two. Dragos was very welcoming and his pets as well, the two beautiful dogs kept us company for the whole stay and the cats were also very sweet. Really beautiful scenery and surroundings we took amazing photos and had a really peaceful time staying here, away from the noise of the city. The cabin was equipped with everything you might need including pots and pans and spices to cook, the heated floor and the little fireplace inside kept us warm and cozy. We will definitely revisit.

reviews.name: Andrea
reviews.message: We loved every minute of our stay! Everything was as described, the location quiet and relaxing with a beautiful view on the surrounding mountains. The tree house is very cozy and has everything you might need. The hosts were very nice and welcoming and everything was explained to us very well. But for us the highlight of our stay were the two beautiful dogs and two cats! If you love peaceful nature, animals and unique accomodations this is definitely for you.

reviews.name: Andra
reviews.message: A wonderful experience with friendly, welcoming and communicative people, wonderful conditions, privacy and very sociable furry friends.

reviews.name: Florentina
reviews.message: A unique location, relaxed atmosphere, a good opportunity to recharge your batteries, we will definitely come back!

reviews.name: Klaudia
reviews.message: the reservation was spontaneous but it exceeded our expectations, the host was kind, nice, attentive, gave us tips for spending time in the area. reviews.message: That was a great experience

reviews.name: Serbia

reviews.name: Cristian
reviews.message: Location was spotless from every point of view (and peaceful). The owner even told us when we arrived that the bed might be a bit smaller for the both of us, but we could sleep amazingly well, with actually enough room to spare in that bed. I am pretty "solid" at 1.89cm height, and my 17 y/o son is tall as well and "well-built". The host, his wife, and their parents as well were such amazing people. We also had their two mountain dogs and two cats visit us often, which was a plus for us, since we love animals. The dogs are VERY nice and extremely friendly (just a reminder). Just fluffy-carebears. I highly recommend this location to anyone.

reviews.name: Ana
reviews.message: We had a great stay at Piece of Heaven! Little paradise in the lidsr of nature surrounded by ships, the cutest dogs and cats. The hosts were very helpful and nice!

The hosts, or the grandparents, were very friendly and helpful and made good suggestions for sightseeing in the area. If you needed something, they could help you out right away. Overall a great experience, I can only recommend it and will definitely come again!!

reviews.name: Iulia
reviews.message: I fully recommend this place. Not only did it look better than the pictures, but the hosts were incredibly kind, responsive, welcoming, and helpful. The place is super easy to get to. You arrive and the host welcomes you with a tour. You have plenty of space to park your car. You enter through the hosts' front yard, walk above a cute bridge above a pond with ducks, and get to your 'tree house' all the way in the back. The tree house has an amazing view, a nice terrace with a table and a bench, and inside there is a super comfy bed, a fire place, small kitchen, toilet, shower, fridge, extra blanket, extra trash bags/toilet paper/soap/dishes, still water, and â€“wait for itâ€“floor heating! Everything is super clean and tidy. At night, it's quiet and you see the stars. The air is fresh. There's plenty of hiking routes and things to do around if you like nature. But I gotta stress â€” the hosts vere EXTREMELY kind and genuine people. Definitely worth it!!!

reviews.name: Rafael
reviews.message: The house is located inside the plot where the owners also live, and there are other houses for rent. The views are amazing, and the surroundings are beautiful. The house is small, as described, although the description indicates that the bed "has foam mattress, it is customized, and it is not a standard double bed", the reality is that the width of the foam mattress is not enough for two adults to rest comfortably, which caused the second night to have a contracture on the back that conditioned the rest of my trip. The rest of the services of the house is correct, although the toilet and the kitchen do not have physical separation, not even a curtain, which can be uncomfortable, and unhygienic.

reviews.message: The electricity was unstable, the lights were blinking all the time, it was hurting our eyes, also we were afraid to charge our laptops. The floors were squeaky, the pillars were half rotten, I can go on and onâ€¦ Ohâ€¦ I forgot, I burned myself on the toilet, if you are over 60kgs, you will not fit on the toilet without getting burned. there is a pipe next to the wc thatâ€™s connected to the heating and you have to poop sideways so you donâ€™t get burned. There is no light at the bbq area, we had to use our phones to light up. Letâ€™s say, compared to the amazing photos taken, the house is poorly made, and kinda uncomfortable for 4 people. The host was nice, the dogs were amazing even tho they stole our food at night. I never left a bad review on this app, but I feel this one is necessary. Response from Dragos November 2023 At the moment you parked the car, even before seeing the house your group started with a very bad attitude, that the location is not as you expected (without doing a little bit of research on the location and surroundings) I even offered to give a full refund if you wish not to stay to our place. We didn't hear any complains from you during the stay. Feedback such as rotten pillars are unfortunately untrue. Those pillars (which are nost structural pillars, are recovered from an old house, they are not rotten, but aged, and they were intentionally placed there to give a particular feeling. Also burning on the toilet is a bad joke. That pipe is designed to heat the toilet space and it goes maximum to 60 degree (the heat is electronically controlled), nobody (not even families with small kids) ever had any issue with it in hundred of stays that we had. Also you wanted a place in the woods but are surprised when you left the food outside over night that it disappeared. There are foxes in the woods, other small mammals, cats, and also our dogs. Also if there was problems with the light we could have replaced them in minutes if you would have mention it. It is important to note that you have only bad reviews on Airbnb also and we somehow expected problems. Usuals people are saying that the place is much more better than in the photos because the photos are made by us as amateurs with just our phones. This was indeed our lowest review since 4 years on Airbnb but fortunately our Airbnb are enjoining the experience, are understanding what we offer when they book a place and they don't come arguing even from the moment they parked the car. So I am sure you can go on and on with bad reviews because this was your attitude from the moment your group came.. We are note a hotel, we are an experience accommodation, a family business and the place was build to bring you closer to the nature, give you a special feeling which we are glad that we can provide to most of our quests who come to us open minded.

It is important to note that you have only bad reviews on Airbnb also and we somehow expected problems. Usuals people are saying that the place is much more better than in the photos because the photos are made by us as amateurs with just our phones. This was indeed our lowest review since 4 years on Airbnb but fortunately our Airbnb are enjoining the experience, are understanding what we offer when they book a place and they don't come arguing even from the moment they parked the car. reviews.message: The apartment was exactly as shown in the photos. The location is absolutely stunning - surrounded by nature and incredibly peaceful. The accommodation was fully equipped with everything we needed. While compact, nothing was missing - every detail had been thoughtfully considered.The breathtaking views made our stay truly memorable. I highly recommend this place to anyone who loves nature and seeks tranquility. It's the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life.

reviews.message: What a wonderful quirky place to stay. Loved the guitar theme (lots of photos!) but comfort is not sacrificed. There are neighbours either side of the property but the outside areas (decking at front door and shelter in the garden) were enjoyable places to hang out and enjoy the quiet. Wonderful views of the surrounding mountains that are spectacular. There is a wonderful trout restaurant nearby (turn right onto the paved road when leaving the unpaved access road. Perfect place to stay for a few nights before driving to Bucharest to fly home. Thanks Drago!

reviews.name: Ohio
reviews.message: Such a unique place! Everything was as described. A few notes for those that may help when finding the right pace for them. We did prepare a meal using the stove and outdoor grill. There are plenty of plates and cookery available for a party of 4 (or more!). Small fridge made it easy for breakfast and lunch prep. Good supermarket about 10 minutes away. Both beds are elevated up a small set of stairs and mattresses are on the floor. This may be a concern if you have mobility issues. I found the beds to be quite firm. The outdoor space is wonderful. As other reviewers mentioned, it is not standalone property with privacy. This property is on a residential street with other rentals and full time residents near by. Neighbors have dogs who serve as excellent guard dogs and cats that visit the property frequently. Overall, this was a memorable stay. Iâ€™d recommended it for anyone as an alternate to camping!

Catalin 8 years on Airbnb Rating, 5 stars , Â· October 2022 , Â· Stayed a few nights Awesome location and architecture. This is a quiet place that will recharge your batteries. Gabriel 10 years on Airbnb Rating, 5 stars , Â· September 2022 , Â· Stayed a few nights Great scenery. Extremely fresh air. The dome is awesome, spacious, has a great patio.
